Hence,  I  conclude  that  the  failure  to  consider  Section  71(2)  of  the
Finance  Business  Act  No.  42  of  2011  in  the  impugned  order  of  the
Learned High Court Judge is erroneous in law.
Therefore,  I  set  aside  the  order  of  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  of
Colombo dated 06.10.2023 and direct the Learned High Court Judge of
Colombo  to  consider  1st  and  2nd  preliminary  objections  before  procced
The Registrar of this Court is directed to send this judgment to the High
Court of Colombo for necessary implementation.
